mapper.sql: comment_id, content, subtime, sts, lev, articleid, b_1, b_2, b_3
mapper.insert: insert into comment (comment_id, content, subtime, sts, lev, articleid, b_1, b_2, b_3) values (#{commentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{sts,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{lev,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{articleid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{b1,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{b2,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{b3,jdbcType=CHAR})

mapper.update:
update comment
content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
subtime = #{subtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
sts = #{sts,jdbcType=TINYINT},
lev = #{lev,jdbcType=INTEGER},
articleid = #{articleid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
b_1 = #{b1,jdbcType=CHAR},

b_3 = #{b3,jdbcType=CHAR},
where comment_id = #{commentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
